languages.text: "Осторожно, элантах. Аребенниан придирчиво взвешивают силу слов. Опасайся получить желаемое, вывернутое наизнанку, словно звездное полотно, лишившееся светил".

traits.locale_text: "Осторожно, элантах. Аребенниан придирчиво взвешивают силу слов. Опасайся получить желаемое, вывернутое наизнанку, словно звездное полотно, лишившееся светил".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Be careful, elantach. Arebennian weigh each word with meticulous pedantry. If you do not take care, you will receive what you want, only turned inside out, like the fabric of the void without any stars."
languages.original_text: "Осторожно, элантах. Аребенниан придирчиво взвешивают силу слов. Опасайся получить желаемое, вывернутое наизнанку, словно звездное полотно, лишившееся светил".

traits.locale_text: "Be careful, elantach. Arebennian weigh each word with meticulous pedantry. If you do not take care, you will receive what you want, only turned inside out, like the fabric of the void without any stars."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Be careful, elantach. Arebennian weigh each word with meticulous pedantry. If you do not take care, you will receive what you want, only turned inside out, like the fabric of the void without any stars."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Be careful, elantach. Arebennian weigh each word with meticulous pedantry. If you do not take care, you will receive what you want, only turned inside out, like the fabric of the void without any stars."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Be careful, elantach. Arebennian weigh each word with meticulous pedantry. If you do not take care, you will receive what you want, only turned inside out, like the fabric of the void without any stars."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “要当心，外界人。独角会以一丝不苟的态度，完全按照字面意思来理解你的措辞。如果你不够当心，你依然能得到你要的东西，但根本不是你想要的结果，仿佛没有任何星星的虚空一样。”
languages.original_text: "Be careful, elantach. Arebennian weigh each word with meticulous pedantry. If you do not take care, you will receive what you want, only turned inside out, like the fabric of the void without any stars."

traits.locale_text: “要当心，外界人。独角会以一丝不苟的态度，完全按照字面意思来理解你的措辞。如果你不够当心，你依然能得到你要的东西，但根本不是你想要的结果，仿佛没有任何星星的虚空一样。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Cuidado, elantach. Los Arebennian cargan cada palabra con una pedantería meticulosa. Si no controlas lo que dices, recibirás lo que buscas, pero vuelto del revés, como el tejido del vacío sin ninguna estrella».
languages.original_text: "Be careful, elantach. Arebennian weigh each word with meticulous pedantry. If you do not take care, you will receive what you want, only turned inside out, like the fabric of the void without any stars."

traits.locale_text: «Cuidado, elantach. Los Arebennian cargan cada palabra con una pedantería meticulosa. Si no controlas lo que dices, recibirás lo que buscas, pero vuelto del revés, como el tejido del vacío sin ninguna estrella».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「気をつけて、エランタ。アーベニアンはひとつひとつの言葉に細心の注意を払う。何を言うか気をつけないと、星ひとつない虚空のように、望んだものと真逆の結果になるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "Be careful, elantach. Arebennian weigh each word with meticulous pedantry. If you do not take care, you will receive what you want, only turned inside out, like the fabric of the void without any stars."

traits.locale_text: 「気をつけて、エランタ。アーベニアンはひとつひとつの言葉に細心の注意を払う。何を言うか気をつけないと、星ひとつない虚空のように、望んだものと真逆の結果になるかもしれない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Seid vorsichtig, Elantach. Arebennian wägen jedes Wort mit penibler Pedanterie ab. Wenn Ihr nicht aufpasst, bekommt Ihr, was Ihr wollt — nur auf links gedreht, wie das Gewebe des Nichts ohne Sterne."
languages.original_text: "Be careful, elantach. Arebennian weigh each word with meticulous pedantry. If you do not take care, you will receive what you want, only turned inside out, like the fabric of the void without any stars."

traits.locale_text: "Seid vorsichtig, Elantach. Arebennian wägen jedes Wort mit penibler Pedanterie ab. Wenn Ihr nicht aufpasst, bekommt Ihr, was Ihr wollt — nur auf links gedreht, wie das Gewebe des Nichts ohne Sterne."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Méfiez-vous, elantach. Les Arebennians pèsent chaque mot avec un pédantisme méticuleux. Si vous n'y prenez pas garde, vous recevrez ce que vous voulez, mais à l'envers, comme la trame de l'espace sans les étoiles. »
languages.original_text: "Be careful, elantach. Arebennian weigh each word with meticulous pedantry. If you do not take care, you will receive what you want, only turned inside out, like the fabric of the void without any stars."

traits.locale_text: « Méfiez-vous, elantach. Les arebennians pèsent chaque mot avec un pédantisme méticuleux. Si vous n'y prenez pas garde, vous recevrez ce que vous voulez, mais à l'envers, comme la trame de l'espace sans les étoiles. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Dikkatli ol elantach. Arebennianlar, ağızdan çıkan her kelimenin en ufak bir ayrıntısına dahi takılır. Eğer dikkat etmezsen yine istediğini bulursun ama yıldızları arka yüzünde kalmış uçsuz misali ters yüz edilmiş olur."
languages.original_text: "Be careful, elantach. Arebennian weigh each word with meticulous pedantry. If you do not take care, you will receive what you want, only turned inside out, like the fabric of the void without any stars."

traits.locale_text: "Dikkatli ol elantach. Arebennianlar, ağızdan çıkan her kelimenin en ufak bir ayrıntısına dahi takılır. Eğer dikkat etmezsen istediğini bulursun ama ters yüz edilmiş olur... Tüm uçsuz senin olsa da yıldızlar geride kalır."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
